TopicTitle: orbiting the sun, FOREVER! (pls help me get back to earth

Articles.Content: ok geez i ran out of fuel, and now I\'m in the sun\'s orbit. there\'s still a little bit to get back to earth\'s orbit so what can i do?

If your orbit can\'t get in kerbin\'s SOI, your stuck in orbit.

You might need to launch a rocket around the sun to use landing gear legs to grab the ship and return to kerbin.

Can you imagine how LONG that would be without time-warp?

Anyway, the best you can do is have your orbit intersect Kerbin\'s SOI, but even then, you\'ll need to have enough fuel to make it back in the atmosphere.

However, timing your burn or waiting for your ship to get into Kerbin\'s SOI can be pretty long, so you may have to consider saying goodbye to those 3 Kerbals ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Rest in Peace, your Kerbals. They will never be able to get back... To return, you\'d need to have enough fuel to drop your orbit to about the same as Kerbin\'s and then reverse it so you hit it head on.
